name: Bernard Hill
text: The work that these guy do are amazing. The 4 large trees kept the sun from fully shining in our backyard and when the first tree fell we could see the difference. text: National Tree Service removed three really large trees for me. They were quick, professional and did a really impressive job. I would absolutely use them again and would highly recommend them to you too!

name: Jaime and Elsa Hensley
text: Recent storms/strong winds caused a very high pine tree to topple over. It was close the street and over our driveway. National Tree Service was the most responsive company to help out with our emergency. They offered great pricing and within an hour were at my house to cut up the tree. Anthony and main office maintained me updated as they cleared up the toppled tree. Anthony went above and beyond to get this unexpected project taken care of.

resp.text: Dear Jaime and Elsa, Anthony and the rest of NTS crew work really hard. Hearing good and positive reviews from our clients really make their day. Thank you so much for trusting National Tree Service for your tree service needs.

name: erica dozier
text: Be sure to do thorough research. Wish I had. I saw the BBB rating without reading current complaints.  The tree was removed but the stump grinding, which I paid for, was not performed. I have contacted the company twice but received no response. I will file a complaint the the BBB, if only to record the service. Hopefully more people will read the complaints and the BBB will reflect this in the company's rating. They are dishonest and unprofessional.

name: Jared Wilkinson
text:
Had NTS come out and quote me on a tree removal. They were double what a competitor quoted. When I gave him the number he said he would do it for that, so be sure you get multiple quotes before using them. He said they would be out the next day at 10-11am. They showed up at 2p the next day, which is fine, and proceeded to cut down the trees. They did a great job with the removal and cleanup to the curb. The minus one star was for the person who came the next day to pickup the debris. He got all of it which was great but left 4" gouges in the yard which I had to dig out and fill up.

I do think you should give them a shot and if they are the best price, use them. Just be sure to check around when having work done to get the best price.

resp.text: Jared, we appreciate for giving us the opportunity to serve you and for your positive review. We will keep on striving to improve  to provide our clients a safe and cost effective solution for all their tree service needs. Thank you.

name: Philip Gannuscio
text: I recently had National Tree Service out  to my home to remove several large pine trees and grind a couple of  stumps. Nationals representative, Anthony Taylor, came out to give me a quote. He was extremely professional and really knew his stuff.The next day Anthony and his crew showed up and removed my trees , handled my stumps , and cleaned up any and all branches and debris. I was very impressed with the professionalism of the entire  company. Anthony ( and National) delivered what they promised and I have already referred them to clients , neighbors, and family members .Truly awesome company

name: James Taylor
text: Great knowledgeable staff! Very fast, responsive and friendly! Give them call for all your tree needs!

name: The Good, Bad & Ugly Properties
text: AwEsOmE!!  National Tree Service did an outstanding job cutting a tree for us. I was working with my sons on a screen printing job &  told him I’m stepping out to grab a bite to eat & see how those tree cutters are doing. On the way I stopped by our property & saw NTS already finished & left. I snapped a photo & texted a son who was also amazed. Towards the end of the day I thought to myself  I'll email or call them to ask what's the quickest way I can make my payment because we are happy customers. When I sat down at the computer, voila! NTS already emailed me the invoice which allowed me to conveniently make  payment online. As we folk in Alabama say, "Gracias". Thanks for your assistance National Tree & I look forward to calling you again. – Antonio Espinoza

Thank you so much for allowing us to serve you. Of course, KUDOS to our crew members...nice job guys! You made National Tree Service proud!

name: Ryan Hoffman
text: This is by far the most unprofessional company I have ever hired to do work at my house. To begin with, the estimator came out and gave me a price on having 2 trees cut down and having the stumps ground - trees are in the back yard behind a locked gate. I was told to expect a phone call that afternoon for scheduling. After 3 days I called the office and was told that they never received my estimate but they would put me on their schedule. A date was set and then was moved several times. I scheduled someone to come do bobcat work around that date as well. I then received a call asking if they could come that day (Thursday) and do the work. I said yes and left my office to go home and meet them. They finally showed up around 4:45 in the afternoon and got one tree down and told me that they would be back at 8:30 am the next day. I had to call the office at 3 pm to see if they were still coming to finish the work since I had to take another day to stay home from work. I waited to hear back and was told that they should be out sometime that afternoon. The crew finally showed up around 5:30 pm. They were able to get the second tree down but did not have the equipment to grind the stumps and I was told that they would come Saturday morning to finish up. Saturday came and went without anyone showing up and no phone call. The following Wednesday I get a call from the office asking if I was happy with the work and to confirm that they had removed all the debris from my yard, I told the person on the phone that they were not supposed to remove debris but they were supposed to grind stumps. She was unaware of this and said that she would make a note of it and have someone call me. Later that afternoon I got a phone call letting me know that someone would be out the next morning to grind stumps. I waited the entire day at home after taking off work, again, and NTS was again a no call no show. At this point I gave up on having anyone come complete the job. A couple weeks later, the company showed up without calling to try and finish grinding 2 stumps. The guy told my wife that he couldn't finish because there was some concrete and rocks that the didn't initially see and that he would need to come back later to finish the work. At this point I have had to call and cancel on my bobcat guy twice, which has cost both of us money. This job was started in April, and it is now the end of May. If you don't have anything to do and want to work with a company that is completely incompetent with communication, then National Tree Service should be ok. Otherwise, do yourself a favor and stay clear.

name: Ismael Torres
text: Don't use their service, repeat don't use their service. On July 29-2020, they send Samuel to price a job. Now the day before coming to do the work one of their employees came to tell us that Samuel the guy they send to price the work they would be doing, is not qualified to make the quote. The guy that came today from the office said that the job is $2,500 more on top of the quote. This is unacceptable and shows how unprofessional they are. For that reason I don't recommend them.

name: Vic Mobley
text: I called to see if they had firewood and asked what time they close. I drove out there at appox.12:30-12:45 in the afternoon.  When I arrived ALL THE PARKING SPACES in front of the business were filled with cars. I parked along the road and went to the door s and they were locked, didn't see anyone inside so I knocked then went to my car, drove inside the fence to the building and yelled inside, "Is anybody here?", and no one answered....So I left.

resp.text:
I apologize for the inconvenience Mr. Mobley. We were out for lunch when you stopped by and crews were out cutting trees down that's why no one was at the office. I hope that you let us know when and what time you would come to make sure that somebody will be at the office to accommodate you.
Thank you.

They worked like dogs all morning, then finally took about a 30 minute break, back to work again. The entire crew was courteous and very friendly. Absolutely no collateral damage, and the yard was neater than when they got there! Little long to get trees picked up, but they had A LOT going on in the area. They did get picked up in a reasonable amount of time. Both me and my 82 year old Mom were very pleased with the results. I have absolutely no hesitation to recommend Eastern Tree Service. They have an excellent reputation, because they earn it every day. When I need tree service again, there is ONLY one place I'm calling, period. Eastern Tree Service. I know I will be pleased with the work they do!

name: Susan Turner
text: Great company, the crews are very friendly and hard working.. They do great work in the time They are there..would tell my friends and family to use them.

resp.text: Thank You Susan !

name: Joseph Adrian Rickert
text: I bought a tree swing for my daughter's birthday and called Eastern Tree Service to hang it for us. They were extremely courteous and came out the very next day and hung the swing, which took only about 10-15 minutes. It was professionally done and we were extremely impressed with their service. I would highly recommend Eastern Tree Service.

name: Paige Raymond
text: I found Eastern Tree Service on line and took a chance calling without any prior  recommendation. I am grateful to Jordan & Bob for being so pleasant and efficient in organizing someone to do our job so quickly. They sent Garth to handle our situation. He was a delight and nothing was too much trouble. I truly found their team and their polite,  'can do' attitude refreshing!

name: Crystal Riquelme
text: Really Great Company!! Would recommend them to everyone I know. Great Work at Great Prices!! Would have to say they are the best in Town..

name: Leah Hays
text: Could not have ask for a better crew to come work at my house. They did a fantastic job! There were no tracks left in the yard and if it were not for the sawdust no one would ever be able to tell that we had a tree removed. They did a great job leaving the area clean! Shout out to Ms. Donna in the office also, she was so good about staying in touch with me and delivered what was promised!

name: Daniel Gallegly
text:
These guys are some of the best. I've worked a lot with Robert at Eastern Tree Service and it is clear to me that he cares about his customers and how well that his company takes care of them and the quality of the work.

I could write paragraphs on how much I admire his character and the great company he has built.

I can highly recommend Eastern Tree Service.

name: Leo Vargas
text: I got quotes from 3 separate tree services for 3 trees and eastern was by far the best price. The crew was polite and finished the job in a timely manner. The clean up crew was very good I did not find one single limb from any tree or any spike balls from the sweet gum tree. The only reason I didn't give 5 star is because my back yard yet from green to dirt.

name: Tim and Emily Merritt
text: I have know the owner since high school (20 years ago) and he has always been nothing less than respectful and kind!  I would trust Robert to handle an tree service that I would ever need!

resp.text: Thank You so much Emily !

name: Allen Golightly
text:
I cannot rave enough about Eastern Tree Service. Their Professional  work ethic is outstanding. The team that was assigned to work on my project were very courteous,respectful and professional. They paid extra attention to make sure that no damage was done to my yard, flower beds, and rock wall when they were dropping the 8 trees. The clean up was fantastic. I was surprised at how much care they took to make my yard look as normal as could be. Now, shout outs. First I want to thank Bob Young.  When I first called Eastern Tree I was told that someone would come to survey my job site and give me an estimate of the cost of the job. I figured that it would be about 3-5 days till I saw someone. The very next afternoon Mr. Young arrives and does a very thorough assessment. I was amazed at his knowledge of trees plant life in my yard. And what a professional and gentleman he was. The cost quote blew me away. Not only was it fair it was honest. The second shout out goes to the 2 ladies that run the tree service office. They are Ms. Donna and Ms. Michelle. If you want to talk to the most sweetest, kindest, knowledgeable (about all aspects of the tree service business), and  the most professional office personnel  you will ever meet; then contact them. Oh, by the way, the other local tree service companies ever returned my calls. I was shocked because I used their services in the past. But let me tell you the truth,  Eastern Tree Service is a professional establishment and trustworthy, and they will treat you with respect. I urge you to call them for your next project.
My thanks to everyone at Eastern Tree Service.

resp.text: Thanks Allen !

name: Michael Taylor
text: Very professional, Christian organization that will work with you and help make your tree removal process seamless and easy. Thank you so much for your help.

resp.text: Thank you so much michael !

text: I had some trees cut and removed from my yard. The guys at Eastern Tree Service did a great job.  Earlier I had received a couple quotes and then a friend recommended I call Bob at Eastern.  He came by to take a look and his quote was in line with the other companies, and since I had a friend refer them and spoke highly of their reputation, I decided to award Eastern the job. Two of Bob's sons, Samuel & Jacob, along with Josh and a couple other guys were on the team who cut the trees down.  They all worked well together and did a good job.  I'd recommend them, not just because of the work taking the trees down, but because they were a good group, easy to talk to, and were cautious as the worked and cleaned up well.

name: Linda Franklin

Eastern Tree Service had called the day before service required to make sure someone would be at home to open our gate. Anyway, I was really pleased with job they did. They cut down two large oaks and grinded three stumps. They cleaned really well. I was really impressed. I would recommend Eastern Tree Service to anyone.

text: I had 3 trees cut down and the crew did a great job at a very reasonable price. The gentlemen were very professional and they left the work site in pristine condition. I would highly recommended this company to anybody...

name: Valarie JONES
text: 2 gentlemen arrived in mid-June and gave me a written estimate for the job, which involved cutting and removal of a line of trees and bushes running parallel to my home.  After several delays, a crew finally arrived at the beginning of August with lots of machinery.  The crew leader talked to me for a few minutes regarding the work to be done.  I had to leave for 20 minutes to drive a family member to work.  When I arrived back, the crew and machines were at the bottom of my street leaving.  They said the job would be double the amount quoted and told me the office would call me.  It is now mid-September and the office has still not called me.  I would not recommend this company to anyone.

name: Becky Troullier
text: I heard about Eastern Tree Service every Saturday morning on 105.5 – so I decided to give them a call.    I had 3 trees that needed to come down and two that needed a good trimming.   My husband talked with Terry and got an estimate.  As usual I had lots of questions so Terry came back the next day.  We spent an hour talking and he gave me a very fair estimate of the work.    On the day the work was to be done the crew showed up earlier then what was expected and had completed everything including clean up in a matter of a few hours.   Everyone on the job was very professional – I was impressed.   We have a back yard now --- and we very much looking forward to seeing grass growing in our back yard instead of leaves, tree branches and sweet gum balls everywhere.  Thank you Eastern Tree Service -- these guys are the best!!!

name: Joyce Elane
text: Great service cut two pines. Workers worked as a team trees were  down in no time. Cleaned up . Hauled the trees away. Ground up the stumps. Highly recommend.

name: Charles Denson
text: Robert and crew are some of the most professional, easy to deal with groups in the industry.  You can count on them to do you a fantastic job in a timely manner.

name: Wendy Roberts
text: Called. Left message with someone 5 days ago and still no one has called me back.

resp.text: Hello , we do apologize for the delay , but apparently we took down the wrong number , if you could please call us directly , I guarantee we will have someone assist you immediately !  (205)856-2078

name: Cathy Fohl
text:
I wish I could give this company 10 stars!!  These guys are unbelievable.

Our neighborhood was recently hit by a tornado causing damage to homes and property.  Within hours after the storm, a neighbor called Eastern Tree Service (ETS) to come help with restoration.  ETS arrived promptly and began calling in its crew and within hours the properties that were being serviced by ETS were transformed back to a livable state.  ETS started removing trees and debris from our homes before noon and by the end of the day they had cleared the trees and hauled away all debris.  The stumps were removed the next morning.   I was amazed by how well these guys worked as a team allowing them to get the job done as efficiently as possible.  They were very respectful of my property and went to great lengths to make sure they didn’t tear down what was left of trees and shrubbery.   I was also impressed with how the owner was working side by side with his employees.   It was evident they took great pride in doing the job right.

Last but certainly not least this company was very reasonable on its pricing.  Prior to this incident, I had several trees removed by other tree services and ETS’ pricing was in line with what I was quoted previously.  I was very appreciative of this fact since I had heard countless stories of price gouging in storm cleanup.  After all the cleanup was complete, the owner stopped by one last time to make sure everything was handled to our satisfaction.

On a final note, what impressed me most about this company is what the owner did for an elderly neighbor.  Having found out this neighbor was weak from having chemo treatment, he restored his property at almost no cost.  The owner is not aware that anyone knew about this gift which makes it even more commendable.

Great job guys!!

resp.text: We are very humbled by your kind words ! We enjoyed being able to serve you and your neighbors !

name: susan turner
text: Does a great job!!! Great workers and very friendly.

resp.text: Thank You so much !

name: Ashley Hollis

text: This company cut down a tree for us on a job site. The job was done in a professional timely manner. We were pleased with their services.

name: Jamie Theodore
text: We had a pretty big tree fall across our front yard and driveway in some storms today. Robert and his crew happened to be in the neighborhood doing another job. On their way out of the neighborhood, around 7:30 pm, they saw us in our front yard and stopped and asked if we were okay. Then, they immediately hopped out of their trucks, cut up the tree, and cleared our driveway. They did all of this unprompted, and when we asked him how much we owed them he told us we didn't owe him a thing. Thank you Robert and your crew SO much for your kindness and generosity! We can't tell you how much we appreciate your help!!

resp.text: Thank You for the kind words ! We Love our job and the opportunity to serve !

I tried to give this company my business and received a major attitude in return. This is terrible customer service and a poor business practice. Needless to say, I will be giving my business to another tree service company.

We do hope you were able to find someone to take care of your needs safely . We hope you have a great year !

text: The owner (arborist) gave an educated consult to what needed to be done then supervised over 2 tree removals and some large at risk branch removals. They didn't destroy my yard in the process and even went the extra step to ensure satisfaction by filling some holes. I've been happy with the efforts.

name: Nick Melton
text:
I emailed Coastal and got a response from Josh within 12 hours. He came out the next day (on a Saturday!) to review my problem and give me an estimate. He quoted me the best price (by far!) of the three places I contacted. He also said he'd take care of it as soon as he could. We ended up responding back and forth as I worked out some issues and questions with timing and things and he was very helpful, responsive and patient. He and his team even showed up a bit earlier than they said they would. He worked with me that day (it was extremely cold and my wife was caring for our newborn and our house was without power while they worked so we had to get it reconnected and it was a whole ordeal) to do everything efficiently and I believe they even finished a bit quicker than he estimated. I am very grateful to have a good guy and company like this to call on when needed.
My job was a huge oak that was leaning towards my house. It was in a kind of land-locked area  behind a bunch of houses, so it was very difficult. All the companies said no vehicle or bobcat or anything could get back there, so that made it more expensive. It was a difficult job and they took care of it safely and in good time.

resp.text:
Mrs. Dunning,

That being said, Bigelow's Tree Service is built on the reputation of being on time and completing a job to the highest standard. My 17 years in the military have taught me that being "in the right place, at the right time, in the right uniform" is of the utmost importance when establishing relationships. For this reason my business would not survive if I conducted myself in the way you portrayed. I will tell you that I will not be the cheapest in town. I take extra precautions, in accordance with the International Society of Arborists, to ensure the safety of myself and my crew. Additionally I focus on the quality of work, not the speed at which I can get it completed. This being said I am sorry that you had a bad experience with a local tree company, however, I assure you that it was not me. If you would like to discuss this further please give me a call.

Since then I have called Kevin in need of firewood and he had one of his assistants, Houston, deliver a truck bed load to our home on two occasions. text: Kevin just recently cut several large branches as big as a 250 pound man and as long as 10 feet. I have two pecan trees and they are monsters! name: Beth Amason
text: Takes advance of older people. Charges credit card fees on top of insanely high prices. Then tells us we are liars. Do not use!

resp.text:
Beth,

After looking at our records we have no indication that we've done work for you. You may have written a review under the wrong tree service company.

To address your statements, however, we do price our services very competitively at Kevin's Tree Service and try to provide our customers with the best price possible. We have had many happy clients over the years, and one of the things we hear from our customers most often is what a great value we're able to provide. Also, we do explicitly state in our contracts that there will be an additional fee for paying with credit card as is the case for many small, locally-owned businesses.

text: Kevin and his group of guys are top notch. They can make hard jobs look easy! I gave him a call and within the hour he was at the house to look at the tree and give a quote. It was in the back yard by a house, fence, shed, and a carport and he got that whole tree down without getting anywhere near any of it. They work fast and safe and I would recommend them to anyone who has an impossible tree or any tree that needs cut down. You won't regret your choice of going with Kevin's tree service. Thank you again for your hard work.

text: I used The Original Webster Tree Company to trim a major tree. Joshua is one of the most professional individuals that I have dealt with in the service industry.
